org.lindbergframework.core.context
Interface Context<C extends Context,E extends Configuration>

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoreContext, LinpContext
public interface Context<C extends Context,E extends Configuration>

Interface that defines the contract for modules Context implementations.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
